body:
Hey everyone!
As you most of you might already know...my name is Athena aka. AthenaDimou0811

In this discussion, I would like to make this clear:
AthenaDimou0811 ---> Ateh

In other words:

AthenaDimou0811 = Ateh

Please remember this xD!
I would appreciate it!
Thank you for looking at this discussion.

Oh and please comment whether it suits me or not. If not, why.
Thank you so much!
I hope to see you guys in game!

title: New Name

replies.body: Your new name is pretty cool :P
replies.body_tagged: Your new name is pretty cool :P

replies.body: Correct me if I'm wrong; however, I believe these types of threads are not permitted on the Avicus forums.

replies.body:
Think of it like this: Let's say you have a sibling. Your sibling and you are having an arguement and it's annoying your parents. Would you rather have your parents tell you to stop, and punish you if you continue, or would you rather have your parents punish you right away for arguing? 


Athena: This is your warning, please don't make threads about a Personal Update as it is against the rules.

replies.body:
Nice new name! but as others have already said this topic should be locked.

D. 9. "Discussions surrounding personal updates, accomplishments or events is frowned upon as they are meant to be inclusive rather than oriented around a single person. Punishments for this will only be distributed in the event that a user continuously uses the forums for this purpose alone."

#LockDown
